channel.title: Data on Modeling of Everything
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Modeling of Everything

item.title: Using random forest to predict bandgaps and HOMOs
item.description: A new idea that whether we can bypass quantum chemistry calculation using proper machine learning method is very popular now. It will be very interesting if we could have a second way to resolve material discovery objective rather than using Density functional theory (DFT) that is the major method in every material discovery projects. Here I will just primarily compare predictions from DFT and a popular machine learning method called random forest.

item.title: Linear Regression with different Python libs: numpy, scipy
item.description: Linearing regression is one of the fundamental techqiques to use when analyze the data. If you were using Python, you would have several options to do this, including numpy, scipy and sklearn.
